archdesc.bioghist: University panel charged with reviewing policies and practices regarding space allocation to student organizations and to make recommendations on the nature of university involvement with student organizations. Panel was created in the wake of controversy concerning space in the Michigan Union used by the Michigamua Society.
archdesc.scopecontent: Records include the panel's charge, transcripts of public hearings, print-outs of e-mail messages sent to the panel, print-outs of website content including anti-Michigamua site created by Students of Color Coalition, and a chronology of the Michigan Union.
